Advisory:
The ``bleach.clean`` behavior parsing ``noscript`` tags did not match browser behavior in Bleach versions v2.1.4, v3.0.2, and v3.1.0 (and probably earlier versions too). 

Calls to ``bleach.clean`` allowing ``noscript`` and one or more of the raw text tags (``title``, ``textarea``, ``script``, ``style``, ``noembed``, ``noframes``, ``iframe``, and ``xmp``) were vulnerable to a mutation XSS.

See: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1615315
